Text:
trying to retrieve users from firebase and it is not possible stating an error that its returning an optional value , the code has been attached below.
please help.

**code**


    

> Blockquote

        
    
    
   `
    //variables
    
    var ref = FIRDatabaseReference.init()
    
    var beaconManager: KTKBeaconManager!
    
    var region: KTKBeaconRegion!
    
    var region1: KTKBeaconRegion!
    
    var region2: KTKBeaconRegion!
    
        
    var devicesManager: KTKDevicesManager!

   
  

    @IBOutlet weak var points: UILabel!
    
    
    @IBOutlet weak var currentUser: UILabel!
    
    
    
    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
    
        ref = FIRDatabase.database().reference()
    
      
        // Initialize Beacon Manager
        beaconManager = KTKBeaconManager(delegate: self)
        beaconManager.requestLocationAlwaysAuthorization()
        
        // Create Beacon Region
        let proximityUUID = NSUUID(uuidString: "f7826da6-4fa2-4e98-8024-bc5b71e0893e")
        region = KTKBeaconRegion(proximityUUID: proximityUUID as! UUID, major: 28239, minor: 56890, identifier: "kcal1")
        
        region1 = KTKBeaconRegion(proximityUUID: proximityUUID as! UUID, major: 28239, minor: 25090, identifier: "lulu1")
        
        region2 = KTKBeaconRegion(proximityUUID: proximityUUID as! UUID, major: 28239, minor: 42637, identifier: "pizzahut1")
    
    }
    //actions
    
    func beaconManager(_ manager: KTKBeaconManager, didRangeBeacons beacons: [CLBeacon], in region: KTKBeaconRegion) {
        
        print("Did ranged \\"\\(beacons.count)\\" beacons")
        
    }

   
    var pointsGiven = 25
    var pointsGivenL = 35
    var pointsGivenp = 15
    
     var points1 = 0
    
    
    
    @IBAction func logoutButton(_ sender: Any) {
        logout()
    }
    
    @IBAction func kcalButton(_ sender: Any) {
        var points2 = points1
        points2 = points1 + pointsGiven
        points1 = points2
        print(points1)
               self.beaconManager.startRangingBeacons(in: region)
    }
  
    @IBAction func luluButton(_ sender: Any) {
        var points2 = self.points1
        points2 = points1 + pointsGivenL
        points1 = points2
        print(points1)
          self.beaconManager.startRangingBeacons(in: region1)
    }
    
   
    @IBAction func pizzahutButton(_ sender: Any) {
        var points2 = self.points1
        points2 = points1 + pointsGivenp
       
       points1 = points2
        self.beaconManager.startRangingBeacons(in: region2)
         print(points1)
    }
    
     
    
    func setupProfile(){
        
        
        let uid = FIRAuth.auth()?.currentUser?.uid
        FIRDatabase.database().reference().child("users").child(uid!).observeSingleEvent(of: .value, with: { (snapshot) in
            print(snapshot)
    if let dictionary = snapshot.value as? [String: AnyObject?]{
                self.currentUser.text = dictionary["username"] as! String?
            }
            
        }, withCancel: nil)
    }
    
    

    
    
    func logout(){
        let storyboard = UIStoryboard(name: "Main", bundle: nil)
        let loginViewController = storyboard.instantiateViewController(withIdentifier: "login")
        present(loginViewController, animated: true, completion: nil)
    }

    
}            '     `

please help.

**code**

    //variables
    
    var ref = FIRDatabaseReference.init()
    
    var beaconManager: KTKBeaconManager!

    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
    
        ref = FIRDatabase.database().reference()
    
      
        // Initialize Beacon Manager
        beaconManager = KTKBeaconManager(delegate: self)
        beaconManager.requestLocationAlwaysAuthorization()
        
        // Create Beacon Region
        let proximityUUID = NSUUID(uuidString: "f7826da6-4fa2-4e98-8024-bc5b71e0893e")
        region = KTKBeaconRegion(proximityUUID: proximityUUID as! UUID, major: 28239, minor: 56890, identifier: "kcal1")
        
        region1 = KTKBeaconRegion(proximityUUID: proximityUUID as! UUID, major: 28239, minor: 25090, identifier: "lulu1")
        
        region2 = KTKBeaconRegion(proximityUUID: proximityUUID as! UUID, major: 28239, minor: 42637, identifier: "pizzahut1")
    
    }
    //actions
    
    func beaconManager(_ manager: KTKBeaconManager, didRangeBeacons beacons: [CLBeacon], in region: KTKBeaconRegion) {
        
        print("Did ranged \\"\\(beacons.count)\\" beacons")
        
    }

   
    var pointsGiven = 25

    var pointsGivenp = 15
    
     var points1 = 0
    
    
    
    @IBAction func logoutButton(_ sender: Any) {
        logout()
    }
    
    @IBAction func kcalButton(_ sender: Any) {
        var points2 = points1
        points2 = points1 + pointsGiven
        points1 = points2
        print(points1)
               self.beaconManager.startRangingBeacons(in: region)
    }
  
    @IBAction func luluButton(_ sender: Any) {
        var points2 = self.points1
        points2 = points1 + pointsGivenL
        points1 = points2
        print(points1)
          self.beaconManager.startRangingBeacons(in: region1)
    }

        points2 = points1 + pointsGivenp
       
       points1 = points2
        self.beaconManager.startRangingBeacons(in: region2)
         print(points1)

    func setupProfile(){
        
        
        let uid = FIRAuth.auth()?.currentUser?.uid
        FIRDatabase.database().reference().child("users").child(uid!).observeSingleEvent(of: .value, with: { (snapshot) in
            print(snapshot)
    if let dictionary = snapshot.value as? [String: AnyObject?]{
                self.currentUser.text = dictionary["username"] as! String?
            }
            
        }, withCancel: nil)
    }
    
    

    
    
    func logout(){
        let storyboard = UIStoryboard(name: "Main", bundle: nil)
        let loginViewController = storyboard.instantiateViewController(withIdentifier: "login")
        present(loginViewController, animated: true, completion: nil)

Text:
trying to retrieve users from firebase and it is not possible stating an error that its returning an optional value , the code has been attached below.
please help. ive added the debugger message below as well

**code**

    `
    
    var ref = FIRDatabaseReference.init()
    
   

    @IBOutlet weak var points: UILabel!
    
    
    @IBOutlet weak var currentUser: UILabel!
    
    
    
    override func viewDidLoad() {
        super.viewDidLoad()
    
        ref = FIRDatabase.database().reference()
    
      
    }
    

   
   
    func setupProfile(){
        
        
        let uid = FIRAuth.auth()?.currentUser?.uid
        FIRDatabase.database().reference().child("users").child(uid!).observeSingleEvent(of: .value, with: { (snapshot) in
            print(snapshot)

    if let dictionary = snapshot.value as? [String: AnyObject?]{ self.currentUser.text = dictionary["username"] as! String?   //Error is caused on this line EXC_BAD_Instruction ( code= EXC_I386_INVOP,subcode = 0x0)
            } 
            
        }, withCancel: nil)
         
       Delegate Proxy automatically. To disable the proxy, set the flag FirebaseAppDelegateProxyEnabled to NO in the Info.plist Snap (fpzfqMTapNel8F90q8bEO450eYg1) {
    email = "abcd@test.com";     
    points = 100;     
    username = abcd;     } fatal error: unexpectedly found nil while unwrapping an Optional value (lldb) }
         `
